summary: When The Hood finds and invades International Rescue's secret base and traps most of the Tracy family, only young Alan Tracy and his friends can save the day.
cast: Brady Corbet|Debora Weston|Soren Fulton|Lou Hirsch|Alex Barringer|Demetri Goritsas|Genie Francis|Philip Winchester|Deobia Oparei|Bill Paxton|Kyle Herbert|Dominic Colenso|Ben Torgersen|Sophia Myles|Ron Cook|Johannes Zadrozny|Nicola Walker|Ben Kingsley|Anthony Edwards|Harvey Virdi|Bhasker Patel|Vanessa Hudgens|Lex Shrapnel|Rose Keegan|Stewart Howson|Mark Nelmes|Julian Spencer|Andy Smart
title: Thunderbirds
